meanings.definition: Showing compassion or benevolence towards others.
meanings.sent1: The humane doctor always took extra time to comfort his patients.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be humane and considerate towards all living beings.
meanings.sent3: The humane teacher allowed the students to bring their pets to class for a day.
meanings.sent4: Her humane actions towards the stray animals spoke volumes about her character.
meanings.sent5: The humane act of rescuing the injured bird left a lasting impact on the community.

meanings.sent1: The humane gesture of offering a warm blanket to the homeless man was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: She had a humane nature that endeared her to everyone she met.
meanings.sent3: The humane decision to host a charity event raised funds for a good cause.
meanings.sent4: His humane approach to conflict resolution diffused tense situations effectively.
meanings.sent5: The humane smile on her face brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.definition: Marked by an emphasis on humanistic values.

meanings.sent2: Their humane policies reflected a deep commitment to human rights.
meanings.sent3: The humane philosophy of the group inspired positive change in society.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of challenges, his humane leadership provided hope and guidance.
